envelope-from=notifications@netenforcers.com.hfgjzwtspjovyfk.emsvr.com; helo=esmtp.emsvr.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 22 Feb 2007 16:46:36.0156 (UTC) FILETIME=[04150BC0:01C756A1] (multipart/related) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/html)

2/22/2007

 

tritonhealth@aol.com

 

VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL

RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED

 

Designated Agent

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

George Poletes

1333 Stemmons Pwy Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

 

Re: Valeant Pharmaceuticals International – DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement

To Whom It May Concern:

This firm represents Valeant Pharmaceuticals International (Valeant) and is duly authorized by Valeant to act on its behalf in Copyright and other Intellectual Property matters.

 

This letter serves to inform you, as the Registered Agent for Internet Hosting that copyrighted images owned by Valeant appear on a website tritonhealth.com  served by your company.

 

The infringing images appear at the following URLs:

 

http://www.tritonhealth.com/kinerase-cream.php

A printout of these webpages, with the infringing images highlighted, is also attached for your reference, although the URLs listed should be sufficient to allow you to determine the exact location of the infringing images.

 

These images appear on Valeant’s website and are Valeant's copyrighted material. I have a good faith belief that the posting of these images has not been authorized by Valeant or any of its agents.

 

Note that you may lose your "safe harbor" under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act if these images are not taken down in an expeditious manner. You are also encouraged to contact your customer who has posted these images and demand that the customer cease this infringing activity. Please be sure to retain all files and documents needed to identify the subscriber responsible for posting the infringing images, as we may need to issue subpoenas in the future to identify these individuals.

 

I declare, under penalty of perjury, that the foregoing Notice of Copyright Infringement is accurate, and that VCLM Law has been duly authorized by its client, Valeant Pharmaceuticals International, to send this notification.

 

If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers Compliance Management Department via facsimile to 352-505-0040, or via email to Compliance.Manageme nt@NetEnforcers.com.  All communication must be in writing.  Calls directly to Valeant will not be accepted. 

 

Sincerely,

VCLM Law

Lance C. Venable

Attorney at Law

 

 

Compliance Management

Net Enforcers, Inc

Compliance.manageme nt@netenforcers.com
